title: U.S. Curling Chief Resigns in Furor Over Handling of Past Abuse Complaints
description: Jeff Plush, the chief executive of curling’s national federation, stepped down after athletes complained that he had previously failed to address abuse in women’s soccer.
dc:creator: Juliet Macur
media:description: Jeff Plush resigned Friday as the chief executive of U.S.A. Curling.
